title: 100Talk - 100 Thieves Podcast
description: Commentary on all things to do with 100 Thieves' League of Legends professional team.

episodes.title: Ssumday to Start, Bang Leaves for EG, Bot Lane Questions
episodes.subtitle: Cole and Jordan are back for the fourth time (that’s 4 shows in 3 days for anyone keeping track at home) because SSUMDAY IS BACK. THE RETURN OF THE KIND KING. We had resigned ourselves to his departure. We had accepted that we’d never see another 1v2 in t
episodes.description: Cole and Jordan are back for the fourth time (that’s 4 shows in 3 days for anyone keeping track at home) because SSUMDAY IS BACK. THE RETURN OF THE KIND KING. We had resigned ourselves to his departure. We had accepted that we’d never see another 1v2 in the toplane. We genuinely really like FakeGod. But it’s Ssumday. He’s back. We also talk about Deftly, what’s going on in bot lane, and if Ry0ma is our starter. Listen here. TIMESTAMPS: 3:42 - #TrustThePapa - The moment the #1 trending topic on Twitter began 7:02 - Ssumday’s back “as our starting top laner” - Top/Jungle synergy, implications for FakeGod 13:21 - Bang traded to Evil Geniuses (according to ESPN) - Bot lane is still up in the air 22:37 - Did EG leak the Bang trade?? - Why’d they do Deftly like that? 25:23 - 100T Sneaky? What’s our best look bot lane and what do the different options say about our approach to 2020? 30:56 - Are we a developmental team or a win-now team (or something in between)? 37:07 - Wrap up and what a time to be a Thieves fan Follow 100Talk on twitter: https://twitter.com/100talkpod Subscribe to the 100Talk podcast: Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/100talkpod Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5DwGKIOuNZouvF7N4TyPor?si=A4pSbfvmR3qpIBtAzJLKxg iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/100talk-100-thieves-podcast/id1403240691?mt=2 Google: http://bit.do/100talkpod Stitcher: https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast TuneIn: https://tunein.com/podcasts/Video-Games/Den-of-Thieves---100-Thieves-Podcast-p1140590/ Player.fm: https://player.fm/series/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast

episodes.title: EMERGENCY SHOW: Meteos Returns??? 100 Thieves Free Agency News
episodes.subtitle: All aboard the 100Talk time machine as Cole and Jordan invoke their emergency pod powers and discuss 100T Meteos, starting jungler for our team, 100 Thieves, in the year of our Lord 2020. We talk about our feelings, the ongoing value of transparency and w
episodes.description: All aboard the 100Talk time machine as Cole and Jordan invoke their emergency pod powers and discuss 100T Meteos, starting jungler for our team, 100 Thieves, in the year of our Lord 2020. We talk about our feelings, the ongoing value of transparency and whether now is a smart time for PapaSmithy to go into more detail on Meteos' exit, and the revised outlook for 2020 with a confirmed lineup of ??? in top, Meteos in jungle, ??? in mid, ??? at ADC, and ??? at support. Listen here. TIMESTAMPS: 2:10 - Meteos has returned - reactions to the announcement video 6:29 - Transparency, reasons for Meteos’ initial exit, and what should PapaSmithy say about the past? 16:42 - Meteos the player - what does it mean to have the strongest jungler 100T has ever fielded back on the rift? Potential synergies with other potential starters. 23:53 - Even more roster speculation - suddenly, Meteos is our only confirmed starter for 2020 what is happening Follow 100Talk on twitter: https://twitter.com/100talkpod Subscribe to the 100Talk podcast: Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/100talkpod Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5DwGKIOuNZouvF7N4TyPor?si=A4pSbfvmR3qpIBtAzJLKxg iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/100talk-100-thieves-podcast/id1403240691?mt=2 Google: http://bit.do/100talkpod Stitcher: https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast TuneIn: https://tunein.com/podcasts/Video-Games/Den-of-Thieves---100-Thieves-Podcast-p1140590/ Player.fm: https://player.fm/series/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast

episodes.title: Free Agency: Ry0ma Joins 100T, Many Questions Remain
episodes.subtitle: Free agency is officially open, and the 100 Thieves roster dominoes are beginning to fall. Cole and Jordan come together for a brief discussion of what we know in the wake of ESPN's Free Agency special, and speculate regarding the glaring gaps in the curr
episodes.description: Free agency is officially open, and the 100 Thieves roster dominoes are beginning to fall. Cole and Jordan come together for a brief discussion of what we know in the wake of ESPN's Free Agency special, and speculate regarding the glaring gaps in the current LCS contract database. The offseason is JUST getting started. Listen here. TIMESTAMPS: 4:01 - Ry0ma to 100T confirmed by ESPN 12:38 - Ryu leaves 100T (favorite memory and a tribute) 16:54 - AnDa leaves 100T (favorite memory at IG’s expense) 19:45 - Fragas leaves 100T (cutest memory) 21:30 - JungleJuice gets 2-year extension as head of strategy 25:59 - Meteos rumored to be linked to 100T again 35:19 - Does Ssumday or Bang leave? Follow 100Talk on twitter: https://twitter.com/100talkpod Subscribe to the 100Talk podcast: Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/100talkpod Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5DwGKIOuNZouvF7N4TyPor?si=A4pSbfvmR3qpIBtAzJLKxg iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/100talk-100-thieves-podcast/id1403240691?mt=2 Google: http://bit.do/100talkpod Stitcher: https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast TuneIn: https://tunein.com/podcasts/Video-Games/Den-of-Thieves---100-Thieves-Podcast-p1140590/ Player.fm: https://player.fm/series/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast

episodes.title: #TrustThePapa, End of (pr0lly)Watch, Zikz Hired, Amazing's Departure - 2020 100 Thieves LCS Preseason
episodes.subtitle: After an eventful day of LCS news, Cole and Jordan have a tea party to discuss PapaSmithy's first few Big Decisions™. We say goodbye to Amazing, pr0lly, and pr0llywatch, say hello to Zikz, and discuss what could be lurking on the horizon for 100T. Are we
episodes.description: After an eventful day of LCS news, Cole and Jordan have a tea party to discuss PapaSmithy's first few Big Decisions™. We say goodbye to Amazing, pr0lly, and pr0llywatch, say hello to Zikz, and discuss what could be lurking on the horizon for 100T. Are we going to have a contender, or are we going to #TrustThePapa during a rebuilding season? Choose your adventure. Listen here. TIMESTAMPS: 3:47 - Worlds Takeaways (Will China Ever Lose Again?) 10:00 - PapaSmithy Debuts as GM (esports Tom Hanks, Chalked season?, “Clear communication”, What to expect for 2020, Korean connection?) 24:32 - Zikz Debuts as Head Coach (Our pr0lly Watch is ended, Coaching philosophy, Developing NA talent, Does Zikz have pull?) 41:55 - Free Agency Looming (Amazing is looking for a new team, What do we expect at each position?) 53:15 - Listener/Twitch Chat Questions (Who stays to help “develop” new players?, Stick with the current korean imports Bang and Ssumday or swap one/both of them out for new imports?, Do you think we will stay in NA or import a mid?) 1:08:34 - Closing Thoughts / #TrustThePapa Follow 100Talk on twitter: https://twitter.com/100talkpod Subscribe to the 100Talk podcast: Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/100talkpod Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5DwGKIOuNZouvF7N4TyPor?si=A4pSbfvmR3qpIBtAzJLKxg iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/100talk-100-thieves-podcast/id1403240691?mt=2 Google: http://bit.do/100talkpod Stitcher: https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast TuneIn: https://tunein.com/podcasts/Video-Games/Den-of-Thieves---100-Thieves-Podcast-p1140590/ Player.fm: https://player.fm/series/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast

episodes.title: Diary of an NA Fan - I Hate Cats
episodes.subtitle: Dear Diary, It's me, NA Fan. I hate cats. After a 1-2 day for NA that felt worse in some ways than an 0-3 day, Cole and Jordan reconvene to try and identify what’s salvageable amongst the wreckage of our 2019 Worlds hopes. Here’s what we find: the cat wil
episodes.description: Dear Diary, It's me, NA Fan. I hate cats. After a 1-2 day for NA that felt worse in some ways than an 0-3 day, Cole and Jordan reconvene to try and identify what’s salvageable amongst the wreckage of our 2019 Worlds hopes. Here’s what we find: the cat will continue to haunt our dreams. If these were the easier games I don’t want to see the hard ones. At least we aren’t FPX today.Timestamps:1:06 - Intro (Dear Diary,)2:57 - TL vs IG8:16 - CG vs FNC14:51 - C9 vs HKA Listen here. Follow 100Talk on twitter: https://twitter.com/100talkpod Subscribe to the 100Talk podcast: Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/100talkpod Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5DwGKIOuNZouvF7N4TyPor?si=A4pSbfvmR3qpIBtAzJLKxg iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/100talk-100-thieves-podcast/id1403240691?mt=2 Google: http://bit.do/100talkpod Stitcher: https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast TuneIn: https://tunein.com/podcasts/Video-Games/Den-of-Thieves---100-Thieves-Podcast-p1140590/ Player.fm: https://player.fm/series/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast

episodes.title: Diary of an NA Fan - 10/12/19
episodes.subtitle: Dear Diary, It's me, an NA fan. My heart beats fast for Team Liquid. I'm not sure Clutch even HAS a heartbeat... Cole and Jordan are having so much dang fun watching Worlds 2019 that they’ve decided to talk about it. In this new series, “Diary of an NA Fa
episodes.description: Dear Diary, It's me, an NA fan. My heart beats fast for Team Liquid. I'm not sure Clutch even HAS a heartbeat... Cole and Jordan are having so much dang fun watching Worlds 2019 that they’ve decided to talk about it. In this new series, “Diary of an NA Fan”, your favorite dads explain what it’s like to grasp desperately to optimism in the face of unfathomable historical underachievement. Today’s diary entry covers TL and CG’s opening games of the tournament. TIMESTAMPS: 1:03 - Show start and series overview 4:10 - TL vs DAM 12:11 - CG vs RNG 21:17 - Day 2 (10/13/19) preview Listen here. Follow 100Talk on twitter: https://twitter.com/100talkpod Subscribe to the 100Talk podcast: Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/100talkpod Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5DwGKIOuNZouvF7N4TyPor?si=A4pSbfvmR3qpIBtAzJLKxg iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/100talk-100-thieves-podcast/id1403240691?mt=2 Google: http://bit.do/100talkpod Stitcher: https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast TuneIn: https://tunein.com/podcasts/Video-Games/Den-of-Thieves---100-Thieves-Podcast-p1140590/ Player.fm: https://player.fm/series/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast

episodes.title: Surprise Show - 2019 Worlds Group Stage Pickems
episodes.subtitle: 100T didn't qualify for Worlds, and now Riot's servers are down so the boys can't enjoy a nice refreshing block of #RecLeague. So Cole and Jordan are bringing you an impromptu Worlds Pickems show for the Group Stage. We have no idea how this is gonna work
episodes.description: 100T didn't qualify for Worlds, and now Riot's servers are down so the boys can't enjoy a nice refreshing block of #RecLeague. So Cole and Jordan are bringing you an impromptu Worlds Pickems show for the Group Stage. We have no idea how this is gonna work, but we hope you enjoy it. Listen here. episodes.title: KEEP IT 100 - 100 Thieves Roster Call-In Show
episodes.subtitle: You've asked endlessly about it, so we're giving it to you: finally, a call-in show for 100T fans to play fantasy GM. Cole and Jordan talk with callers about their proposed LCS rosters and grade the results. This is a genuine limited edition version of 10
episodes.description: You've asked endlessly about it, so we're giving it to you: finally, a call-in show for 100T fans to play fantasy GM. Cole and Jordan talk with callers about their proposed LCS rosters and grade the results. This is a genuine limited edition version of 100Talk that won't last long, so act today! TIMESTAMPS: 6:27 - Jaret87 (Sign college talent) 22:14 - ShadowWing (Full aggro squad) 45:07 - YaBoyGraff (Importing an aggressive support) 1:03:15 - Ferjo0724 (5-alarm hot take) 1:20:15 - CozmikFlash (Go big or keep it steady) 1:34:51 - Blasian (Importing a steady support) Listen here. episodes.title: How to Fix 100T - End of 2019 Off-Season 100 Thieves Roster Show
episodes.subtitle: Despite an encouraging push for playoff in the summer split, the 2019 season failed to live up to expectations. With the dust settling and the summer split officially in the books, it’s time to look ahead. Cole and Jordan assess each of the starters from
episodes.description: Despite an encouraging push for playoff in the summer split, the 2019 season failed to live up to expectations. With the dust settling and the summer split officially in the books, it’s time to look ahead. Cole and Jordan assess each of the starters from the end of the 2019 season and discuss what changes might be needed to return to winning ways in 2020. Plus, we announce the winner of our 100 Thieves Championship Jersey Giveaway! Listen here. TIMESTAMPS: 5:45 - Fantasy GM ground rules and working assumptions10:27 - Top20:25 - Jungle41:21 - Mid1:02:41 - Bot1:12:37 - Support1:17:51 - Head Coach1:29:20 - TL;DW: 80% (I wish) probable 2020 roster1:30:37 - CHAMPIONSHIP PREMIUM JERSEY GIVEAWAY WINNER IS REVEALED 1:31:56 - special note of thanks to the 100Talk Treasury Follow 100Talk on twitter: https://twitter.com/100talkpod Subscribe to the 100Talk podcast: Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/100talkpod YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/100talkpodcast Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5DwGKIOuNZouvF7N4TyPor?si=A4pSbfvmR3qpIBtAzJLKxg iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/100talk-100-thieves-podcast/id1403240691?mt=2 Google: http://bit.do/100talkpod Stitcher: https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast TuneIn: https://tunein.com/podcasts/Video-Games/Den-of-Thieves---100-Thieves-Podcast-p1140590/ Player.fm: https://player.fm/series/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast

episodes.title: Close But No Playoffs - 100T Trips at the Finish Line
episodes.subtitle: After forcing a tiebreaker for a chance at playoffs in dramatic fashion, 100T dropped their tiebreaker bid against OpTic Gaming. After two days, Jordan and Cole finally crawl out of their darkened bedrooms, wipe off the tears, and discuss what went wrong.
episodes.description: After forcing a tiebreaker for a chance at playoffs in dramatic fashion, 100T dropped their tiebreaker bid against OpTic Gaming. After two days, Jordan and Cole finally crawl out of their darkened bedrooms, wipe off the tears, and discuss what went wrong. We also assess FakeGod’s performance under pressure and what two splits out of playoffs means for 100 Thieves. Listen here. TIMESTAMPS: 3:45 - Red Rivalry Bet Update 6:43 - 100T vs Clutch Gaming 12:04 - A disjointed team effort 19:20 - Ye Olde Huni’s revenge 21:15 - 100T vs CLG 28:36 - A maximally decisive showing 31:40 - Ryu saves the season (multiple times) 35:35 - FakeGod shows up on Gangplank 37:31 - 100T vs OPT 43:37 - Karma? Bard? Breaking down an unfamiliar draft 50:37 - A less decisive showing 55:35 - Reviewing FakeGod under pressure 1:00:10 - Was this split successful? 1:04:47 - Paying 2nd most, finishing close to last 1:11:49 - Pr0lly Watch™ - the end of season edition 1:18:29 - Let’s end this season on a positive note. episodes.title: 100T and the Sweet Smell of Playoffs - Win Lane, Win Game - 100 Thieves Summer 2019 Week 8
episodes.subtitle: The penultimate weekend of the summer split is in the books, and our ticket to the playoffs still isn’t punched. While Froggen’s champion ocean frustrates us again, FakeGod’s rematch against BrokenBlade lives up to the hype and more. Join Cole and Jordan
episodes.description: The penultimate weekend of the summer split is in the books, and our ticket to the playoffs still isn’t punched. While Froggen’s champion ocean frustrates us again, FakeGod’s rematch against BrokenBlade lives up to the hype and more. Join Cole and Jordan as we summon the strongest 100Talk buff yet to deliver the team to playoffs. Listen here. TIMESTAMPS: 4:27 - 100T vs GGS 7:05 - Golden Guardians’ goofy draft 11:44 - Hard countering our pick and poke team comp 19:24 - 100T vs TSM 23:12 - Just how much of a power pick is Sejuani for Amazing? 26:24 - FakeGod vs. Broken Blade II 33:02 - FakeGod’s growth over the split - is he coming into his own? 39:30 - How will FakeGod perform with the season on the line? 45:57 - Do we live and die by the draft? 51:50 - The (winding and many-pathed) road to playoffs 56:38 - Looking ahead to the final week of the split. Do we make playoffs? 1:01:43 - Championship Jersey Drop and a word of sincere thanks Follow 100Talk on twitter: https://twitter.com/100talkpod Subscribe to the 100Talk podcast: Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/100talkpod YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/100talkpodcast Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5DwGKIOuNZouvF7N4TyPor?si=A4pSbfvmR3qpIBtAzJLKxg iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/100talk-100-thieves-podcast/id1403240691?mt=2 Google: http://bit.do/100talkpod Stitcher: https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast TuneIn: https://tunein.com/podcasts/Video-Games/Den-of-Thieves---100-Thieves-Podcast-p1140590/ Player.fm: https://player.fm/series/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast

episodes.title: 100 Thieves On The Razor's Edge - Crushed by C9, Crushed FLY
episodes.subtitle: After tasting the high highs and the low lows this weekend, 100 Thieves have only two weekends left to sneak into an LCS playoffs spot. We’re tied for 6th now, but do we have enough gas in the tank against a decently strong set of opponents? Jordan and Co
episodes.description: After tasting the high highs and the low lows this weekend, 100 Thieves have only two weekends left to sneak into an LCS playoffs spot. We’re tied for 6th now, but do we have enough gas in the tank against a decently strong set of opponents? Jordan and Cole convene a meeting of the masses to discuss all this and more. Listen here. TIMESTAMPS: 4:27 - 100T vs C9: Bad news 9:42 - Counterpicking for FakeGod 14:12 - Playstyle notes: Ryu’s power picks (and not-power picks) 17:54 - Scouted: C9 on ultra instinct mode 28:59 - 100T vs FLY: we goof on FlyQuest’s performance for 10 minutes 38:47 - The path to playoffs 43:44 - Respect where it’s due (with Aphromoo) 54:08 - Meeting our sponsors’ demands: pr0lly Watch 59:50 - Week 8 preview: can we finally take down TSM?? episodes.title: 100 Thieves Pushes for Playoffs, Wins Against Optic and Echo Fox - 100T Podcast
episodes.subtitle: The turnaround is real. LCS Summer Split 2019 has gotten super spicy  as 100 Thieves look to make their push into playoffs after starting the split in the proverbial abyssal void. The boys are close to a .500 record and are looking like they're in fi
episodes.description: The turnaround is real. LCS Summer Split 2019 has gotten super spicy  as 100 Thieves look to make their push into playoffs after starting the split in the proverbial abyssal void. The boys are close to a .500 record and are looking like they're in fine form. It's not going to be easy as the margin for error is slim. After a 2-0 weekend featuring wins over Meteos' Optic Gaming and "Is This Guy Serious?" Solo's Echo Fox, Cole and Jordan are here to talk about 100T's chances at salvaging the year - and the hopes of Thieves fans everywhere. TIMESTAMPS:6:55 - 100T vs OPT10:59 - Aphro’s BACK, BABY15:11 - The CS elephant in the room20:03 - How significant are these wins?23:30 - Playing for (and taking) neutral objectives26:11 - 100T vs FOX27:37 - Solo vs FakeGod, Round 230:36 - “You can’t ban Ryu”36:00 - A team full of carries43:20 - Bang doubles his output51:27 - Aphro appreciation thread56:25 - Upholding our duty: Pr0lly watch58:12 - Updated playoff chances 1:02:30 - Next week: C9 + FLY Listen here. episodes.title: Can 100 Thieves Still Make Playoffs? If We Dies, We Dies, FakeGod / BrokenBlade Beef
episodes.subtitle: We’re already on the second half of summer split and as time slips through our fingers, Cole and Jordan ask - can 100 Thieves still make playoffs? Will BrokenBlade ever take a chill pill and leave FakeGod alone? Will 100T lose game win playoffs? AND HOW W
episodes.description: We’re already on the second half of summer split and as time slips through our fingers, Cole and Jordan ask - can 100 Thieves still make playoffs? Will BrokenBlade ever take a chill pill and leave FakeGod alone? Will 100T lose game win playoffs? AND HOW WILL TEAMS DEAL WITH THE FULLY ACTUALIZED RYU??? All this and more with your favorite dads. OH, AND WE ANNOUNCE THE WINNER OF OUR 100T ORIGINAL WINDBREAKER GIVEAWAY! TIMESTAMPS:2:55 - 100T vs TSM7:17 - Lose draft, lose game12:22 - BrokenBlade breaks bad18:50 - FakeGod being tested23:48 - 100T vs TL26:29 - More positive than negative (but a late negative)38:58 - The incomprehensible genius of Ryu42:50 - TL bad or 100T good?47:30 - Is zero margin for error still considered slim?53:19 - Projecting FakeGod’s trajectory this split and beyond59:14 - Contractually obligated Pr0lly Watch™1:03:00 - Week 6 predictions (OpTic, Echo Fox)1:07:36 - GIVEAWAY WINNER WAS IT YOU DID YOU WIN??? Listen here. episodes.title: 100T Resurrection, 2-0 Weekend, Show Anniversary Spectacular
episodes.subtitle: And after the third week, 100T rose from the tomb in a glorified, perfected state. 100 Thieves are BACK after the first 2-0 weekend since week 3 of last split (and origin of the 100Talk buff). With things clicking, Jordan and Cole talk through just how ma
episodes.description: And after the third week, 100T rose from the tomb in a glorified, perfected state. 100 Thieves are BACK after the first 2-0 weekend since week 3 of last split (and origin of the 100Talk buff). With things clicking, Jordan and Cole talk through just how many of this team’s problems are ‘solved’ and how many of them are ‘getting better.’ Will the 13-5 meme become reality??? Also, the dads take some time to celebrate 100Talk’s first birthday and reflect on some of their favorite moments of the show. And you know it ain’t a celebration unless some 100T apprel is being given away... TIMESTAMPS: 4:36 - 100T vs C98:02 - Aggro Bang?!13:18 - Engage Aphro??17:14 - Coaches Smurfing?!!!?18:50 - Aimbot Amazing? ? ? ?23:55 - Also FakeGod27:04 - 100T vs FQ (Lose Lane, Win Game)36:09 - Ryu and resilience41:27 - Is this the new norm? Is this a fluke?47:23 - Pr0lly Watch54:15 - Updated projections55:53 - Is Ryu calling shots? If not, why are we different?58:45 - Week 5 predictions (Who’s calling a 2-0??) 1:11:21 - WINDBREAKER GIVEAWAY Listen here. episodes.title: Loss Streak is OVER! New look 100T improves with Amazing, Ryu, and FakeGod
episodes.subtitle: 100 Thieves rolls the dice with the roster and it pays off as the LCS record futility streak comes to an end and 100T finally gets their first win of the split (and now we’re on a win streak, right?). Amazing lives up to his name while Ryu and FakeGod put
episodes.description: 100 Thieves rolls the dice with the roster and it pays off as the LCS record futility streak comes to an end and 100T finally gets their first win of the split (and now we’re on a win streak, right?). Amazing lives up to his name while Ryu and FakeGod put in rock solid work. Now the fans are asking if THIS is the new look 100T. Will we continue to play FakeGod? Will Soligo return? Is Bang at risk for getting benched? Cole and Jordan dive into these questions and more. TIMESTAMPS: 4:24 - 100T vs GGS5:40 - Is Ryu good? Is Soligo bad?9:56 - Did we miss Ssumday?16:27 - What does it mean to lose to GGS as we did?22:01 - 100T vs FOX23:39 - Solo solo kills FakeGod (is this guy serious??)30:45 - Maurice “Amazing” “100% KP” “Aimbot” Stückenschneider32:46 - Bang36:32 - Is Ryu’s laning unsustainable?41:57 - We Actually Got Pretty Lucky To Win, Guys43:53 - What about Prismal over Bang?54:53 - Pr0lly Watch58:24 - Week 4 predictions (Back to 0-2??)1:01:57 - Listener Questions - @ekogmaw: Ssumday Mid?1:03:45 - Dabis (100T Discord): How long can we keep Ryu in mid given the quality at that position in the LCS?1:07:17 - Wrap-up (and a cliffhanger) Listen here. episodes.title: The Big Sad, Loss to Clutch Gaming, 0-2, A̶t̶l̶a̶s̶ Amazing
episodes.subtitle: Can Amazing Save 100T??? It’s too early to make any sweeping conclusions, but the outlook on this split is dire for 100 Thieves. Jordan and Cole break down another 0-2 weekend that included losses to TL and CG, talk about who’s pulling their weight, and d
episodes.description: Can Amazing Save 100T??? It’s too early to make any sweeping conclusions, but the outlook on this split is dire for 100 Thieves. Jordan and Cole break down another 0-2 weekend that included losses to TL and CG, talk about who’s pulling their weight, and debate whether A̶t̶l̶a̶s̶ Amazing can carry the burden for 100T (as he seems determined to). Reasonable Takes™ incoming. TIMESTAMPS: 4:10 - 100T vs TL - Soligo MVP? Bang Throws?20:47 - 100T vs CG - Does Heroic Defense Matter?31:35 - Cole’s Stat of the Week33:23 - Can you build around Ssumday? Is Soligo Amazing?48:48 - When do we put FakeGod in? Is Amazing our most important player?53:00 - Is the team environment broken beyond repair? Are our import players delivering enough value?57:38 - Amazing: The Final Hope for 100T Listen here. episodes.title: Red Rivalry 2: Electric Boogaloo - Zach from League Leaders Banter Show
episodes.subtitle: Since we last spoke with our friend Zach from League Leaders, 100 Thieves is STILL undefeated against Clutch Gaming. For some reason, he thinks they can win this weekend. He comes on the show to attempt to make his argument before CG’s inevitable loss, an
episodes.description: Since we last spoke with our friend Zach from League Leaders, 100 Thieves is STILL undefeated against Clutch Gaming. For some reason, he thinks they can win this weekend. He comes on the show to attempt to make his argument before CG’s inevitable loss, and we pretend to listen… (Producer’s Note: Zach is an awesome dude and this is all in good fun) Follow Zach: twitter.com/zlindsey01Follow League Leaders: twitter.com/League_Leaders1 Listen here. TIMESTAMPS: 1:07 - Zach “Pennywise” Lindsay Joins the Show 4:28 - Is it Tanner Time Yet? 6:52 - Thinking About Your Ex - A Cody Sun Update 9:50 - Where Has Piglet Gone? 11:20 - Are We Getting Ye Olde Huni or the new one? 13:45 - No Dodges: Where Do CG and 100T Finish? 15:03 - Managing Stress With Minecraft 17:48 - Actual Strategic Analysis of this Matchup 22:54 - Soligo = Nemesis? 24:21 - Wrap-up Follow 100Talk on twitter: https://twitter.com/100talkpod Subscribe to the 100Talk podcast:Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/100talkpod YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/100talkpodcast Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5DwGKIOuNZouvF7N4TyPor?si=A4pSbfvmR3qpIBtAzJLKxg iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/100talk-100-thieves-podcast/id1403240691?mt=2 Google: http://bit.do/100talkpod Stitcher: https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast TuneIn: https://tunein.com/podcasts/Video-Games/Den-of-Thieves---100-Thieves-Podcast-p1140590/ Player.fm: https://player.fm/series/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast

episodes.title: Xing Li talks Amazing & Soligo, start of The Split of Sorrow - 100 THIEVES LCS Summer Split 2019 Week 1
episodes.subtitle: We’re not going to lie to you: that was not the way we planned on 100T starting off. Week 1 saw the Thieves go 0-2, and Cole and Jordan are stuck asking themselves if this is going to be The Split of Sorrow. Fortunately, friend of the show (and crackerjac
episodes.description: We’re not going to lie to you: that was not the way we planned on 100T starting off. Week 1 saw the Thieves go 0-2, and Cole and Jordan are stuck asking themselves if this is going to be The Split of Sorrow. Fortunately, friend of the show (and crackerjack journalist) Xing Li is here to shed his perspective, plus share some of the juicier bits from his recent interviews with 100 Thieves’ new jungler Amazing and rookie midlaner Soligo. We’ll answer the tough questions: Is Soligo going to make it? Are Pr0lly’s days numbered? And most importantly, WHO WON THE 100TALK DAD HAT GIVEAWAY??? Listen here. Thanks to our guest Xing Li - Follow him on Twitter @xingtheli Read his story on Amazing & Soligo here: https://dotesports.com/league-of-legends/news/100t-amazing-soligo-interview-may-2019 TIMESTAMPS:1:23 - Esports Journalist Xing Li Talks Amazing + Soligo Interview24:58 - 100T vs. CLG: Jet Lag + Yuumi = Big Yikes32:46 - 100T vs. OpTic: OpTic Catches a Baron Throw43:41 - pr0lly Watch49:49 - Evaluating Soligo58:22 - Maintaining an Optimistic Outlook in the Face of Extreme Adversity1:00:51 - Week 2 Predictions (Another 0-2???) 1:04:38 - GIVEAWAY WINNER ANNOUNCEMENT (I can’t believe you won!) episodes.title: LCS Returns! 100 Thieves Summer Split Preview
episodes.subtitle: The anticipation is killing us - LCS Summer Split 2019 starts this weekend. We're all eager to see the new (and hopefully improved) 100 Thieves. This week, Cole and Jordan get together for a quick show where we dissect the preseason content we've been giv
episodes.description: The anticipation is killing us - LCS Summer Split 2019 starts this weekend. We're all eager to see the new (and hopefully improved) 100 Thieves. This week, Cole and Jordan get together for a quick show where we dissect the preseason content we've been given, analyze the analysts' predictions of 100T's season, and sacrifice a goat so that we can somehow still make it to Worlds. Listen here. TIMESTAMPS: 3:15 - The Heist: Did Bootcamp Korea Work? 19:27 - Summer 2019: Bang Becomes the Perfect Player 28:04 - Analyst Power Ranking Reactions 35:09 - Three Hopes for a Better Split 39:09 - The Two Possible Summer Splits 51:01 - Week 1 Predictions (2-0 Start??) episodes.title: THE COD JOB - OCTANE + CROWDER talk CWL London, 100 Thieves' first championship, and prepping for Anaheim
episodes.subtitle: Well boys, we did it. CWL London CHAMPIONS Octane and Crowder join 100Talk to discuss what this one means both personally and to the organization, the significance of adding an MVP trophy to the case, how this win changes things for the rest of the season
episodes.description: Well boys, we did it. CWL London CHAMPIONS Octane and Crowder join 100Talk to discuss what this one means both personally and to the organization, the significance of adding an MVP trophy to the case, how this win changes things for the rest of the season, a look ahead to CWL Anaheim, and a run it up tatoo update. HUGE thanks to Octane and Crowder for joining us. Listen here. We'll talk about today's apparel drop experience, Amazing joining 100T, Soligo getting the starting nod, and the return of the man, the myth, the legend - Ryu. And did someone say...giveaway? episodes.title: THE COD JOB - Enable & Crowder - 100Talk Interviews 100 Thieves CoD Stars
episodes.subtitle: For the grand finale of our COD coverage leading up to CWL London, Crowder and Enable join 100Talk to discuss their path to this point, highs and lows of a wild season, the secrets behind 100T’s success both in COD and as an organization, predictions and
episodes.description: For the grand finale of our COD coverage leading up to CWL London, Crowder and Enable join 100Talk to discuss their path to this point, highs and lows of a wild season, the secrets behind 100T’s success both in COD and as an organization, predictions and expectations for London (and beyond), and which member of the squad is most likely to get a neck tat. Huge thanks to Crowder and Enable for joining us before heading overseas! Listen here. episodes.title: THE COD JOB! Interview with Eric "Muddawg" Sanders - 100 Thieves Head of Esports Operations
episodes.subtitle: 100Talk is embarking on a new adventure, this time into the world of competitive CoD. Eric “Muddawg” Sanders - Head of Esports Operations for 100 Thieves - will be our guide as we look to educate ourselves (and our audience) on how we can be as good at wa
episodes.description: 100Talk is embarking on a new adventure, this time into the world of competitive CoD. Eric “Muddawg” Sanders - Head of Esports Operations for 100 Thieves - will be our guide as we look to educate ourselves (and our audience) on how we can be as good at watching CoD as the 100 Thieves squad is at obliterating the competition. Is this the first #CODJob???? YOU decide! Listen here. TIMESTAMPS: 3:27 - Muddawg Intro/Background 6:38 - Qualifying for CWL 17:54 - “Positions” and Playstyles 25:58 - Nadeshot and Muddawg’s COD Play 29:36 - CWL Competitive Format 35:33 - Unique Factors of Competitive COD 41:01 - Thoughts on the CODBurner 45:15 - London Major 47:52 - Priestahh in Fort Worth 51:50 - What does a successful season look like? 54:40 - Phraseology 201: OAKBOYZ, Run it up, Double positive 59:39 - Wrap up Subscribe to the 100Talk podcast: Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/100talkpod YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/100talkpodcast Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/5DwGKIOuNZouvF7N4TyPor?si=A4pSbfvmR3qpIBtAzJLKxg iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/100talk-100-thieves-podcast/id1403240691?mt=2 Google: http://bit.do/100talkpod Stitcher: https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast TuneIn: https://tunein.com/podcasts/Video-Games/Den-of-Thieves---100-Thieves-Podcast-p1140590/ Player.fm: https://player.fm/series/den-of-thieves-100-thieves-podcast
